website_summaries.verdict: One reviewer described the  glossy finish the butter London topcoat gave her nails as "like a new car." Quick-drying, long-lasting, durable and carcinogen-free. What's not to love?
pros: Some reviewers said their nail polish lasted at least a week
Dries quickly even without a UV lamp
cons: Some like the shine of OPI better

customer_reviews.title: New to this line, love the outcome
customer_reviews.text: New to this brand and idea of 5 and 7 free. Very happy with their products. Not always clear in the descriptions exactly what size/ozs you are getting in the purchase. Colors are true to their pictures. A bit pricey for these items, but for a person with nails that are otherwise paper thin, who gave up wearing nail polish due to continual splitting with the use of both acetone remover and non 'free' polishes, the change to these newer 'free' products and a non-acetone remover have made a great deal of difference in my ability to wear polish.
customer_reviews.author: ljvirgo

customer_reviews.title: Great topcoat but buy elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this topcoat but would suggest buying somewhere else. I ordered two bottles in June (always like to have an extra on hand) and when I opened the second yesterday, the bottle was broken. Because it’s outside of the return window, amazon will not replace it. (Please don’t judge the dirty car mats - it collapsed in my hand after I opened the box and I didn’t want it on my car seats!)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love this top coat
customer_reviews.text: this top coat works very well. I was having "Gellish" done for years and then decided to have to do my own nails at home at my convenience. I loved it. My nails dry in about 20 minutes. As with any regular nail polish it will start chipping if you wash dishes, clean or cook...I tried to use dish gloves for the first few days. The polish was good for a week. Even 7 days later when i did not use gloves and washed a lot of dishes on the weekend, the polish is still ok.
customer_reviews.author: Inna Glazman

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: This top coat has held my color on my toes for 3 weeks going on 4 weeks! No chips, and still a beautiful shine.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as their other products.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, because it is free of so many carcinogens. It is pretty durable. But still extremely expensive. I had previously bought their colors in person did not expect such a small bottle. Not as big as their other products.
customer_reviews.author: Eri

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is usually an amazing product. Only top coat I use. It dries quickly with no bubbles. However this seems to be a bad batch. From the first application I've had bubbles on my nails. This has never happened with this topcoat. At $18 per bottle with no returns I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rosen

customer_reviews.title: Love this for a long lasting look
customer_reviews.text: I use 3 coats of this over my color and the shine is like you'd see on a new car. Even with loads of hand washing and dishes, it looks great for at least a week. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jilltoo

customer_reviews.title: This new formula is no better than drugstore brands now
customer_reviews.text: This new formula is no better than drugstore brands now. Chips the next day. Bring back the old formula.
customer_reviews.author: theresa r. perley

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Nice top coat for nails doesn't peel quick, last and protects about 10 days. Real nice shine.
customer_reviews.author: Shivani McK

customer_reviews.title: my favorite top coat!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not crazy about Butter polishes, but I love their top coat. It dries quickly, hard and very glossy. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: L. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Chips and peels quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews saying this chips and peels quickly and for me that's true. The usual brand of sunscreen for nails that I like was sold out for months so I figured Id give this a try. I've thrown it out now that my normal brand is available again.
customer_reviews.author: JulieH2O

customer_reviews.title: No formaldehyde👍
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for the prompt delivery! Love this product and no bad chemicals. I am so allergic to nail polish but several years ago I found this nail polish and its great👍❤️ Sandra C.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stay on, is too thick, and does nothing as advertised. Save your money and buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: DDub

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Second day it was as regular nail polish. Chipped everywhere. It is really expensive for same quality as other nail polish. I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Creative Image

customer_reviews.title: This coat keeps the polish lasting and lasting...
customer_reviews.text: I'm going on 12 days now, but because the nails are growing, will need to redo soon. Love this stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay E.

customer_reviews.title: Butter London Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely adore Butter London and especially the hardwear shine. Love the look!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Two-step

customer_reviews.title: Great top coat but poor brush
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint is the brush. So hard to use! But the product itself was great! Works very good! Shinny and long-lasting!
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Never Again
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and it doesn’t do what it says. Polish chipped the same day it was the Butter Polish.
customer_reviews.author: Carol D. Nelson - Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great but don't get the whole bottles worth!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this top coat! I get 7 days of wear and I consider myself pretty active. Only negative is that you will only get about half the use out of the bottle. After so many coats, the polish turns to a glue consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite top coat. It does exactly what it claims. And last long and super shiny. Obsessed.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Silva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My nail polish lasts at least a week with this topcoat.
customer_reviews.author: BNorth

customer_reviews.title: Peeled Right Off
customer_reviews.text: Very shiny but peeled completely off in the space of 24 hours. Going back to OPI Nail Envy
customer_reviews.author: Sammythegreat

customer_reviews.title: Great on glitter polish!
customer_reviews.text: This top coat works great on my glittery nail polish!
customer_reviews.author: louise

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! It makes my polish last so much longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Long, chip-free, shiny nails, with my favorite non-gel polish!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use butter London Patent-Gel Nail Basecoat and Topcoat, with my favorite non-gel OPI nail polish, and didn't get the long, chip-free wear that I wanted. With butter London's Hardware Shine UV Topcoat, which I put on over the regular butter London topcoat, I now have long, chip-free, shining nails!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Must have top coat. It's worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: If I could, I would give it 4.6 stars, but that's not possible here -- My polish lasted 9 days before a single chip appeared and I love to garden without gloves. I'm so happy that this exists and I can wear polish again without a gel polish.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal H Casanave

customer_reviews.title: it isn't as good as the other polishes
customer_reviews.text: This is the first butter london product i have not been over the moon about... it isn't as good as the other polishes
customer_reviews.author: Ryan McQueen

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't look as good as OPI when it dries but is not as thick and takes less time to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Shellbell

customer_reviews.title: Topcoat
customer_reviews.text: Seems to do the job, bought with 2 Butter nail colors.
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid1221

customer_reviews.title: so worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my nails 12/25 night and there is still no chip and today is 12/28!! Plus I work in healthcare, so I wash my hands constantly!!! TOTALLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: really nice polish and stays on nail longer than most polishes
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy E. Faison

customer_reviews.title: This is my favorite line of safe
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite line of safe, non-toxic nail polish. Rich colors, and this UV topcoat usually makes my manicure last a minimum of a week. Two if I'm not abusing my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Lori B.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this top coat. My nails chip all the time and polish tends to flake off easily much to my chagrin. But this works well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Goodman

product_meta.title: butter LONDON Hardwear Shine UV Topcoat
product_meta.description:
This ultra-glossy topcoat formulated with uv protection locks in color and prevents fading. Our quick-drying, chip-resistant superstar leaves your nails with a high shine, smudge-free finish.

BRAND STORY
butter LONDON is dedicated to delivering high-style colour without compromise, and we continue to innovate-living on the inside edge of fashion, using only the safest ingredients in every product.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
